did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1994-1995

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.971, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was forwarded on 1998 January 21.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
SERIES I: General Files, 1994-1995 Boxes 1-42
SERIES II: Restricted Files, 1994-1995 Boxes 43-44

did.unittitle: Association of Governing Boards Advisory Council of President 1994-1995
Charlottesville, City of Planning and Coordination 1994-1995
Graduate School of Arts and Sciences 1994-1995
National Association of State University and Land Grant (2 folders) 1994-1995
Weldon Cooper Center for Public Service 1994-1995
